alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Jefferson; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 18 at 7:20PM CST until February 18 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northern Green County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Rock County in south central Wisconsin... Southeastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Southern Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 815 PM CST. * At 719 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Cottage Grove to New Glarus, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 90. Locations impacted include... Fitchburg, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, Oregon, Jefferson, McFarland, Edgerton, Evansville, Brodhead, Belleville, Deerfield, New Glarus, Cambridge, Orfordville, Brooklyn, Monticello, Albany, Footville, Lake Ripley and Lake Koshkonong. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. Wet roadways will quickly freeze. Black ice will cause roads, bridges and overpasses to become slick and dangerous. Slow down and be prepared for sudden loss of traction.
